param.name: pCount
param.para: A pointer to an item count.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets result information for a specified item, when successful.

param.name: pItemInfo
param.para: On success, contains a pointer to a structure.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that get item info and item count.
